p: The majority (270/412 studies) of reviewed in vitro studies focused on DENV, followed by WNV (111/412 studies) and ZIKV (73/412 studies) ( Figure 1B). DENV is considered the most common mosquito-borne infection after malaria; therefore, it was expected that DENV would be the most studied MBF in the in vitro literature. There were fewer studies on ZIKV, which is understandable, because ZIKV outbreaks have only raised concern in recent years.
